title: Savory Maine Dining and Provisions
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An organic food restaurant committed to using organic ingredients from state of Maine. Offers a few vegetarian, vegan, as well as gluten free dishes, marked. At breakfast there is a tofu scramble and a vegan sandwich. At lunch there is a tempeh reuben sandwich and a tempeh salad. At dinner there is a tempeh loaf plus various salads. Dogs are welcome on the patio at the picnic tables. Hosts art openings.
